title: Portugal
alt: Highlight photo from my Portugal trip
description: Spent New Years 2026 in Portugal. This was my first time in the country and it certainly wonâ€™t be my last. I got to see Lisbon and Porto and loved every bit of it.

gallery.caption: Sunrise view from the Luis I Bridge overlooking the Ribeira do Porto.
Bosco Porto at sunset, a beautiful outdoor garden bar.
Drinks with my cousin at Bosco Porto.
Selfie on the Luis I Bridge overlooking the Ribeira de Gaia.
Photo of the Santuario de Cristo Rei in Lisbon.
Photo of the Ponte 25 de Abril bridge.
Family selfie at the Castelo de Sao Jorge.

title: United Kingdom
alt: Highlight photo from my London trip
description: Went to the sunny UK to visit a friend. Despite what you might believe, the weather was wonderful. I spent my days sightseeing and enjoying a nice pint of Guinness.

gallery.caption: Street in Kensigton just by Hyde Park.
Me and some friends snacking after a night out.
A photo of the Shard building in the evening.
Me and my friends at Big Ben.
A photo of Tower Bridge in the evening.

title: Japan
alt: Highlight photo from my Japan trip
description: Finally got around to visiting Japan. This trip was unlike any I had taken before. I loved learning about the culture, history, and getting to reconnect with a close friend from high school.

gallery.caption: Festival me and my friend encountered in Shinjuku, Tokyo.
Side street in Tokyo.
Red gate pathway at Fushimi Inari Taisha in Kyoto.
View of the countryside from the Mt Fuji Express train.
Side street in Kyoto in the rain.
Rainy and foggy hike down from Mt Fuji.

title: Germany
alt: Highlight photo from my Germany trip
description: As a part of my grad trip I decided to visit my friend in Germany. Perfect timing too as it was during the Euro Cup hosted in Germany.

gallery.caption: Clock tower in Salzburg(In Austria).
Me and my freind celebrating Germany's win against Scotland in the opening Euro 2024 Football match.
Photo of the Eisbach in the Englischer Garten in Munich at sunset.
Photo of me and my friends at Olympia near Regensburg.
Photo from an open viewing area in Munich for the Euro 2024 match of Germany vs Hungary.

title: Switzerland
alt: Highlight photo from my Switzerland trip
description: Went to Switzerland with my sister. This might be one of my favorite trips in recent memory, the cities and weather were beautiful. I also got a chance to use my German to get around which was so cool.

gallery.caption: Photo taken of Geneva from Cathedrale Saint-Pierre.
Photo of myself taken by sister in Geneva.
Street in Bern.
Photo of Interlaken take from Harder Kulm.
Photo of Zytglogge clock tower in Bern.

title: Spain
alt: Highlight photo from my Spain trip
description: Decided to go on a grad trip to Europe starting with Spain. Got to see so much of the country but it still wasn't enough. Of this trip Madrid and Seville were definitely my favorite.

gallery.caption: Photo of La Sagrada Familia in Barcelona.
Selfie of me and my family in Madrid.
Photo of the Plaza de Espana in Seville.
Flags of Spain and Valencia on the beach.
Fresco in the Museu Nacional d'Art de Catalunya.
Tower in Valencia.
